pr_title: DHFPROD-5148: Ability to show multiple values in a table view for a property.

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5148: Ability to show multiple values in a table view for a property

timeline.bodyText: Can we delete these commented out lines.
timeline.author: bsrikan

timeline.bodyText: Can we delete these commented out lines.
timeline.author: bsrikan

timeline.bodyText:
both "Carm" and "din" can be in different cells and still the test would pass. We want to verify that both Carm and din are in the same cell. Try using:
expect(getByText('Carm').closest('td')).toEqual(getByText('din').closest('td'))
timeline.author: bsrikan
